Review.Titre: My previous new air Stainless steal ice…
Review.Contenu: My previous new air Stainless steal ice maker broke in under a week.. I was shipped and incorrect one and charged 100 dollars.The Agent Mellissa hopefully fixed this problem

Great customer service. I dropped a star because I had to use customer service. We bought a nugget ice maker through Best Buy, and 10 months in it stopped making ice. We tried to call in and get a call back with no luck. Finally, I chatted with Charles online, and he got us a replacement unit.
3 stars for the equipment busting after a year of owning it. But 4 stars because support was extremely helpful in diagnosing and getting me the part ASAP.
Quick delivery.  Product good so far.  We’ll see how long it lasts.

Old and embarrassed!  Realized after I submitted review that the blue tint was the protective film. Can’t believe I did not see it earlier!  Now making ice as expected with stainless steel finish machine!  Enjoy a laugh on me!  ordered the stainless steel color with model # AI-100SS from Lowe’s and NewAir. Both times the model received was a heavily blue tinted stainless with black top.  What i received is not even an option so there is clearly a problem with this particular model.  Buyer beware: The picture and the unit received are not the same.

We love our refrigerator/freezer! It's kind of a trick to get the programming down, but then, it works fabulously!  We bought a second because the price was so great, and now we have our food storage, and a drinks storage, complete with fresh ice! It seems that shipping was very difficult, as the tracking said, "out for delivery," and "failed to deliver" for 3 days, before it actually arrived..not sure why..

Ordering was easy and shipping was fast. After sale support doesn't seem to exist if you encounter any issues. 10/31/2023 Edit: After my review, newair support reached out and resolved the issue. Would be 5 stars if a support ticket can be opened in the normal expected method vs responding via review.

I had an issue with a dual wine fridge I received as a gift, where water was pooling in the top tray of the fridge.  I reached out to customer support and worked with Charles over the past few days to troubleshoot the issue.  Unfortunately, the issue wasn’t able to be fixed and Charles was very helpful in processing a warranty replacement of the unit in a short time frame.

Review.Titre: My ice maker unit stopped functioning…
Review.Contenu: My ice maker unit stopped functioning properly after 8 months of use. However, Charles with Newair was very helpful in replacing my unit (I had to pay shipping though). Customer service was excellent, the product not so much. Hopefully the second unit will last longer.

We received a couple defective products that had to be replaced. Due to some miscommunication it caused some frustration but Charles helped smooth over the situation and got a new replacement sent out quickly. Thank you Charles

Review.Titre: Hilary was very responsive and helpful…
Review.Contenu: Hilary was very responsive and helpful with each return.  She was always willing to assist with shipping a replacement unit. I am currently on my fourth unit - trying to get one that will operate in the heat mode.  The Model that does not heat is NAC14KWHD3.  (I tried three units.)  The 4th unit that heats to around 65 degrees is Model NAC14KWHH2.  I will keep this unit, although I wish it would heat higher than 65 degrees.

It was nice to work with a customer service representative that was caring and responsive.  Vanessa asked appropriate questions and responded in a timely manner to resolve the matter for me.  When my product from Newair stopped working completely, I was assured that my unit would be replaced based on the information gathered during the process.

Review.Titre: Top Notch Customer Service to a Frustrating Product Issue
Review.Contenu: My expectations were low in contacting Newair directly regarding the issue with my tabletop icemaker.  I was blown away with the prompt addressing of the issue that I was having.  It was refreshing to know that the person on the other end cared. Customer service is everything sometimes and Newair does a phenominal job at providing this.  Thank you!

Review.Titre: Thanks to Charles for answering the…
Review.Contenu: Thanks to Charles for answering the chat promptly when the phone number went to voice mail. Would have rated the experience higher if I could have placed the order on the website rather than having to call, then chat, then wait for a call back to place the order.

Have been very happy with our NewAir ice maker machine. Unfortunately, it started having some issues. I reached out to NewAir to report the issue. After a few questions about the matter of my order they have offered to replace the defective unit no additional cost. The experience has not been complicated + the representative has been very responsive, professional, and kind. The customer experience has been great. It’s good to know there are still companies providing good service. I highly recommend this product + it’s company.

Review.Titre: Purchased a nugget ice maker that…
Review.Contenu: Purchased a nugget ice maker that started leaking less than a year after we bought it. I contacted customer service (spoke with Charles) and without hesitation he offered me a refund for my machine. Great customer service.

This ice maker starts to make ice quickly, and will fill the bin in about 6 hours.  After that, the machine continues to keep up with us as we use the ice throughout the afternoon.  Note that it's important to clean the machine once a week, even if you're using filtered water.

The Newair team was responsive and helpful when it came to replacing my ice maker. I only gave 4/5 stars because I had to pay for the shipping of the new ice maker. I believe it should’ve been free since it isn’t my fault that the ice maker stopped working.

Relatively straightforward to get a broken item replaced - even though the original was out of stock, they replaced it with a comparable item which was more expensive. Four stars instead of five because ideally it would not have broken in the first place, and it took a few steps of emailing back and forth throughout the process.The representative I spoke with was very nice, clear and concise about the steps involved.

Review.Titre: Great transition to checkout, but website it a little faulty.
Review.Contenu: With the great sale prices and the smooth transaction to checkout, I can't complain much. However, the site is a little faulty when I try to search for specific products.

Review.Titre: I am leaving this because I was asked…
Review.Contenu: I am leaving this because I was asked to in order to receive free shipping of a new unit back to me to replace a broken one. Hoping that I get it. So far the service has been quick by customer service and I feel confident.

Overall great customer service, however it was a bit frustrating going back and forward for 1 week until I got a resolution. Special thanks to Charles who went above and beyond providing a solution to my issue.

Review.Titre: 30 lb countertop Nugget Ice. Great product but failed early on.  Customer service very good.
Review.Contenu: I have a 30 lb countertop Nugget Ice Maker.  My family really enjoyed the quality of the crunchy nugget ice it made for several weeks after purchase.  Unfortunately it experienced mechanical problems within a month of usage.  Great product while it worked.  Customer service was very good and professional.  Unit is being replaced under warranty.  Look forward to getting the new unit and hoping that this was a one off quality problem.  Great otherwise.

Review.Titre: Box was banged up during shipping
Review.Contenu: Box was banged up during shipping. Product could have been more secure. We will see how it operates during first cleaning cycle and making ice after that.

Good as their word. Pump broke after just seven months (which is why I'm knocking a star off) but their customer service was great. Replaced the unit within in a week with no hassles or pushback and the rep (Camilla) was very helpful.

I recently had problems with my nugget ice machine. Customer Service was excellent.  Speedy resolve to my issue. Couldnt be more pleased. I highly recommend this company to anyone looking for a ice machine. Happy happy camper

Review.Titre: Quit working but getting a replacement
Review.Contenu: We loved our nugget ice maker and were really disappointed that it stopped working after only a year. Their customer service has been very responsive and they will be sending us a replacement.
The product broke after only two month's use, which was disappointing. But the customer service provided by NewAir and specifically their rep, Fern, was excellent.

Awesome customer service! My nugget ice maker started leaking in less than a year and Newair will be replacing it. Only reason for 4 stars is because the leak developed in less than a year. Other than that, it was an awesome ice maker.

Unfortunately, we had to get a replacement unit but the customer service helped us troubleshoot it and made the process as easy as possible for us! One of the easiest customer services I’ve ever dealt with!
Very helpful, although it would be more helpful if Newair also either provided repair service or had a list of trusted repair services.
Ice machine stopped working after only 2 months of use. New air customer support was very helpful and polite when dealing with my issue. Got a replacement at no cost!
After about 1.5 year of using, the temperature sensor stopped working unfortunately. The support was helpful in resolving this issue for me in a reasonable delay. Otherwise the fridge works great.

Review.Titre: add an issue with my icemaker contacted…
Review.Contenu: add an issue with my icemaker contacted customer service after one or two emails. I have a greed to send me a new replacement unit very helpful.

Review.Titre: It's good that there was a guarantee on…
Review.Contenu: It's good that there was a guarantee on the air conditioner. I bought it a month ago and it didn't always turn on. I gave air conditioner. to the store and they changed it to a new one, because mine was of poor quality.
Quick Response for Warranty IssueWhile the icemaker we purchased did break (would not make ice), working with customer service was relatively easy to get a replacement unit shipped to us.

Review.Titre: This is my first time purchasing a new…
Review.Contenu: This is my first time purchasing a new air product and so far I was impressed. I did have a snafu where it was not working as it should. I was able to contact customer service and they were able to help me right away so this was a very good experience I thank them  for that.
The company approved the replacement of the shattered glass door even though it was already out of warranty. But I will have to pay for the shipment if the new door.

Review.Titre: Ash was very helpful and was quick to…
Review.Contenu: Ash was very helpful and was quick to resolve the problem. And promises to get me a new heater and ship it after the quality check has been done before shipping. This will be very helpful since I hang this on the wall and I have to bad shoulders.

Review.Titre: Wanting to buy from NewAir because of…product, reviews, customer service!
Review.Contenu: Wanting to buy from NewAir because of what I had heard about product and what they offered was what I was looking for in out newly remodeled kitchen.I had been on NewAir's website, chatting with other reps, but getting "No" where and feeling like getting the run around (via chat / website closing)- so I called NewAir and left a message.  The person that call back was Laurellee. She was the deal breaker through this process, she answered all my question, had exceptional customer serviceand took care of any issues I had prior to talking with her! So, Thank you for your service and communication skills Laurellee.  Has soon as I put the Wine Fridge AWR-460DB, I'll send pictures.Note: I had also was chatting with Melissa Wagner and would like to Thank her has well with the discount given, for prior computer glitches on ordering.

Review.Titre: Charles did a good job helping with my…
Review.Contenu: Charles did a good job helping with my warranty claim.  I hope the replacement product works better than the first but I am willing to give it a try.

Review.Titre: Our Newair ice maker stopped working…
Review.Contenu: Our Newair ice maker stopped working after nearly a year, and their support department handled a warranty replacement for us.

Nothing compares to nugget ice. Newair nugget ice machine NIMO30SS00 has been a great addition to our kitchen. We love having a seemingly endless supply of crunchy ice, It's been easy to fill and clean. After a few months, we started to notice a puddle underneath the unit. We've notified Newair and they have been very helpful with sending a replacement unit after we provided our receipt and purchase date.
Fast and helpful customer service. My ice maker had a issue and they are sending me a replacement unit.

Review.Pseudo: Jacobus Gideon de la Rey Gideo
Review.Titre: After many attempts and phone calls I…
Review.Contenu: After many attempts and phone calls I was help. Please look at employing more sales reps to answer calls as this will increase sales.
Finally was given a date for restock of a backordered part. Hoping to actually receive it.

Received help with issuing a warranty claim on my counter ice maker - the fan went out and the turn around time for a response was quicker than I thought, same day actually. Which was exciting for someone like me who loves my ice maker!!!
it showed up when scheduled.. it started up when plugged in.. except for a small dent in the side....all was perfect

Review.Titre: Camilla was very helpful in assisting…
Review.Contenu: Camilla was very helpful in assisting to provide appropriate information in order for me to get a replacement unit. My anticipated delivery date is this week and I hope it will come undamaged.
Customer service was very helpful with warranty issue with my ice maker. Ice maker was working wonderfully but experienced a issue and Newair covered replacement.

Review.Titre: Sent Customer Service an email about a missing part
Review.Contenu: Sent Customer Service an email about a missing part.  Had to follow up after a week but they are sending the part.

Review.Titre: Newair and newair CS was great to…
Review.Contenu: Newair and newair CS was great to replace new ice maker that did not work out of box.

Review.Titre: I was on the customer support chat and…
Review.Contenu: I was on the customer support chat and Charles was extremely helpful.

Review.Titre: Called in for assistance with a temperature sensor
Review.Contenu: Called in for assistance with a temperature sensor - Charles, the service rep, was patient, knowledgeable and helpful!

Review.Titre: Machine was great when it worked
Review.Contenu: Machine was great when it worked. It suddenly stopped making ice and a loud noise. Customer service is supposed to send a replacement. Hopefully it will last longer.

Review.Titre: My unit gives me the convenience of ice at the ready
Review.Contenu: My unit gives me the convenience of having ice ready on hand as I am injured and can't go out for ice as usual. I can't drink anything refrigerator cold because I need it ice cold. I also love chewing ice when I'm sitting around watching television. Overall it's a good machine except the water tray cracked due constant use I guess.

Initial unit was defective, but the customer support was excellent and Rebecca did a great job of providing a replacement unit quickly.  The no-hassle return and customer service was why I rated 4 stars along with the price point of the unit.

Review.Titre: The company is doing very good at…
Review.Contenu: The company is doing very good at taking care of the problem iam having with my ice maker.
Fern was helpful and got my issue resolved.

Review.Titre: Communication great but getting parts not.
Review.Contenu: The employee of the company was very helpful and great in communication. The 4 stars are for her for the service she provided. She did her absolute best to help me but the company however has failed me. Companies need more employees like this one, because even though the company couldn’t provide me with the correct parts, she still did her absolute best to keep a customer happy.

Review.Titre: Very easy to set up and use
Review.Contenu: Very easy to set up and use. Cleaning the unit is very easy as well. Sleek design fits into any kitchen design.
Machine did quit working, but customer service did work with me to send replacement.

Review.Titre: I enjoyed the ability to communicate…
Review.Contenu: I enjoyed the ability to communicate and come to a resolution for the issue I have.
Customer service was very helpful with replacing the broken unit.

Review.Titre: I purchased the nugget ice maker in July and it went out in November and I contacted Newair on December 15 and they agreed to replace it and waive the shipping fee I am pleased with the experience.
Review.Contenu: I purchased the nugget ice maker in July and my machine stopped working in Nova

Review.Titre: Newair stands behind their products - excellent customer support
Review.Contenu: Customer Service has been fast and efficient replacing my unit under warranty.

Glad that the defective part is being replaced, but since it is still new the tiny part should be overnighted, so I don't have to wait a week and a half for the part. Great product so far, drain plug design could be improved.

Review.Titre: The customer support agent was very…
Review.Contenu: The customer support agent was very helpful and was able to help me work things out. The reason I gave 4 stars was because the company didn't offer different levels of shipping and I live in Canada and it would have cost me double the value of the product for shipping. This made me feel alienated as a customer simply because I live in a different country. This was not the customer support agents fault, it was the company's fault.

Review.Titre: Order experience Had to wait longer than I wanted on the…
Review.Contenu: Had to wait longer than I wanted on the phone, but everything else was fine

The Newair portable evaporative cooler fan  NEC500WH00 is a good product with a known water pump problem. The fan works really well, and when I manually wet the filter it worked well for cooling.I contacted customer service and was impressed with how the return (no cost to me) and replacement of the unit was handled by the represenative (RG). The new unit is on the way and I look forward to the replacement.

Review.Titre: Great product and the company customer…
Review.Contenu: Great product and the company customer service department is very helpful

Review.Titre: Would like to have had a manual included

Review.Contenu: I purchased the 48 qt cooler to use on my semi. It came with both a 12volt and regular outlet plug. It has been a lifesaver. I have the smaller section setvs the freezer and the larger section set to fridge temp. Customer service is responsive. I wonder though why it is black. Most coolers are light to reflect the heat.

I broke my drawer and wrote in wanting to buy a replacement. Got an immediate response asking me again what issue was. I responded to that email and didn’t hear for a few days. Then once I received a response back again they told me it was being replaced. I got another email saying it was on back order and I needed to respond and let them know if I wanted it still even if it was on back order so they could put the order in. After that I received and email that the order was placed and I would receive it in the mail as soon as it was back in stock and to do the survey please. I thought that was it. Then I received an email that I needed to respond to my ticket number within 48 hours or the order it would be canceled. I’m terribly confused.

Review.Titre: Our wine cooler has been great
Review.Contenu: Our wine cooler has been great. Went to a larger size to accommodate the varieties of wine we enjoy. After six months we had an issue with the temperature not holding. We contacted Sandra at NewAir customer service. It was determined the temperature sensor was faulty. NewAir opted to replace our unit under warranty. Hopefully we’ll be back in business soon.
The customer assistance representative was very helpful, friendly, and easy to work with.

Review.Titre: I ordered the AI-215SS NewAir AI-215SS…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the AI-215SS NewAir AI-215SS Stainless Steel Portable Ice Maker.  I really loved this icemaker as it makes ice fast and really supplies the need for me.  But I recently had an issue and it broke down.  I called and spoke with customer service and they handled the situation to my liking and are sending a new one to compensate for the broken on. Thank you for all of your assistance.

I have a thermoelectric wine fridge that stopped working. WIth a great assistance from Newair customer support, I was able to identify the issue, order a replacement part, and find a reasonable solution so I didn't have to trash an otherwise great wine fridge.

Our wine cooler stopped functioning. Apparently the compressor failed.  The unit was still under warranty.  We contacted the company and they where responsive to our email. They asked us to attempt to reset the temperature but there was no response from the unit. We are awaiting a replacement unit.

I bought a Newair misting fan that I actually use to keep my chickens cooled down a bit in the extreme heat here in Texas in the summer.  the misting hose assembly sprang a leak and I tried to order a replacement part but ordered the wrong part and it didn't fit.  I contacted customer service about getting the right part and they have been helpful in helping me get my fan back up and running. The fan itself is well built and handles the outside elements well, but they don't have the misting hose assembly as a replacement part so instead they are sending me a replacement fan.

Ordered two units, one of which did not work when received. Customer service has been helpful, first by sending a part to replace, then when that didn’t work by sending a replacement unit. The fridges themselves look great and my experience with customer service has so far been very good.

This is my first Newair AI-100S Ice Maker and works like a charm. I have been using it everyday and gives me ice every few minutes and how quickly it makes ice. Although it lasted only 9 months, I called Newair told them the problem and they immediately will replace the unit with no hassle.  That's what you call an AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE and reliable company that you can depend on.  Love this machine and works excellent.

Review.Titre: I lost the plug on my ice maker and…
Review.Contenu: I lost the plug on my ice maker and called the company to see if I could get a replacement. I spoke still a representative named Lucy who was very patient and kind to me.  I’m 80 yrs old and not very good with computers    But she let me take my time and did not lose her patience with me.  She also found the part I need and I will have it next week. Very pleased with the whole experience.
Fern was very helpful and smart and took care of everything I needed

I had purchased a NewAir beverage cooler from a HomeDepot because of the awesome look and large holding capacity. Before a year was up the fridge stopped working. The customer service team at NewAir was very prompt in responding to my issue. The agreed to replace the unit with proof of purchase. They stand behind their products.

We purchased our ice maker in Dec 2021 but haven't had to use it much until summertime (June 2022).  On our 2nd batch of ice, it had a mechanical issue so we contacted customer service for troubleshooting.  Unfortunately, our machine couldn't just be fixed, it has to be replaced.  We are very pleased with the way it has been handled, the customer service dept has been very helpful, they are informative & response time is incredible.  I would definitely recommend this ice machine.

Review.Titre: Everything has been great until I…
Review.Contenu: Everything has been great until I received an email saying that they needed a response to something from a prior email. There was never a request for a new action. Just an order reference number and installation instructions.

Review.Titre: Very friendly customer service technical support agents.
Review.Contenu: This is my second time dealing with NewAir.  The first time they only sent me one thermistor (temperature probe) even though my refrigerator model has dual climate zones and requires two temperature sensors.  At least they owned up to their oversight and I'm receiving the second sensor at no additional cost.  We'll see if this solves the issue.

Review.Titre: Thank you for returning my ice machine…
Review.Contenu: Thank you for returning my ice machine I’m gonna be returning the old one this weekend I just looked it up hopefully this one works better than the other one thank you again for responding so quickly we had a couple of hurdles to overcome but thank you anyway and think Miss Mendez for doing such a good job

The unit arrived with a damaged leg. Customer service sent a new leg, almost immediately. After 4 mo. it no longer cooled. Sandra in C.S. was very helpful & eventually, they are sending a new unit. Rated 4 *"s because of the faulty unit.

I purchased this icemaker for a Christmas present, And it performed really well for about a week. It took up very little space on our kitchen counter, and made good clear ice in a surprisingly short amount of time. After about a weeks time it developed a water leak from inside, so I contacted new air to have it replaced. They were very good about this, and easy to return the old faulty machine and receive a new one.

Review.Titre: When my Dual Zone Wine and Beverage…review
Review.Contenu: When my Dual Zone Wine and Beverage fridge arrived it had an odor in it.  I cleaned it several times with the recommendation I received from the company. It did not take care of the odor and all of the beverages (which was a lot) in the fridge had to be thrown because the odor was so bad. I contacted customer support several times and they have been very helpful and will get the issue resolved.

The left side of my two zone cooler was performing erratically... temp was randomly varying from 36F to 48F.The customer service agent helped troubleshoot the problem in a timely and competent manner.They are sending me out a replacement temp sensor.
We received a quick response from customer service to replace our newair ice maker due to a faulty water pump and appreciate the diagnosis online.

Quick response (with instructions on how to identify the problematic part) to my email request for assistance in figuring out why my wine fridge quit working. Based on the results of following their instructions, I contacted NewAIr and advised their curteous representative what was indicated for replacement. The representative quickly placed an order for the correct part (cooling kit) and arranged to have it shipped to me.  Assuming everything goes according to plan, the fridge should be running again as soon as I get the part.

Important piece of our new ice machine broke, however customer support has been extremely helpful and responded to my questions in a timely manner. 4/5 stars because I'm writing this before the replacement has been delivered. I was given this opportunity to write a review for free delivery.

Review.Titre: Newair is replacing our ice machine…
Review.Contenu: Newair is replacing our ice machine that broke within the first two months. Hoping this new machine lasts.

Review.Titre: We have loved our ice maker...
Review.Contenu: We have loved our ice maker and were totally bummed when it quit working recently.  Costumer service was super helpful in helping us troubleshoot the issue and replace the parts.

Review.Titre: Great Option for a Nugget Ice Maker
Review.Contenu: We purchased a NewAir nugget ice maker in April and have been very happy with it. The ice is the same shape as Sonic or Chick-Fil-A ice, but it isn't quite as soft and chewy as their ice. We love that the machine is easy to clean and fill with water and that it makes a good amount of ice for our family of 4. One thing we don't like so much is that the ice drawer doesn't stay up when you pull it out (and it is a little hard to pull out, especially for kids). It seems like for an expensive ice machine the drawer would have been designed a little better. We also had an issue with it in July (3 months after purchasing) where a piece of metal inside the machine broke off into the ice bin. But since it is under warranty still, the company is replacing the machine for us.

Review.Titre: I’m super grateful to Charles T
Review.Contenu: I’m super grateful to Charles T. @ NewAir.  I purchased a chiller and upon unboxing I noticed that it had a dent in the back. I reached out and Charles was my advisor, I’m excited to report that my new chiller has arrived.  I have unboxed it and plugged it up to ensure that we don’t have any more issues before filling it.  It seems to be running well so far.  Once again thank you so much Charles now I can have my wines 🍷🍷🍷🍷🍷🍷🍷🍷🍷🍷 at the right temperature!!!winesforhumanitycom/lkblueI’m not sure 🤔 what the question is…I know that wine 🍷 is the answer

Our machine stopped producing ice.  When I contacted customer service, they were quick to respond and provided diagnostic info.  When we couldnt fix the issue, they were helpful in replacing the unit right away.

Shipping was outstanding.  Received my package two days after ordering.  The unit was packaged securely with no damage.  The humidor, as of right now, is performing perfectly.  I've read comments about the noise it makes, but mine is barely noticeable.
Vanessa was courteous throughout our conversation, she took the time to listen to my questions and resolved all my concerns. Great customer service.

I recently had to use the claims department for a nugget ice maker I bought in August and everyone I dealt with from Newair was fast and courteous and just a total pleasure to talk to. I got my unit replaced and it was shipped out immediately. Color me super impressed~!
Customer Service at its finest. I love my ice maker and will forever be a NewAir customer.  Vanessa is awesome thank you again! They have an awesome product and even better customer service.

Review.Titre: Ionie Castro's customer service for my…
Review.Contenu: Ionie Castro's customer service for my issues was handled in a very professional manner and she took the time to insure I had all of the details I needed to resolve the issue. She was kind and patient with me and took the time to wait for me to correspond with information she needed on her end. This was a very pleasant experience, and I would recommend her company and especially her as a customer service professional.

We ordered a new wine fridge that stopped working properly shortly after we received it. Customer service was easy to reach and resolved the problem super quickly. They weren’t able to troubleshoot the issue so they replaced it with quick shipping. Couldn’t be happier with my experience.

Thank you so very very much for helping me Charles Trapp, you really acknowledge the work and take care the issue about my broken Ice maker. Your company should give honor. Keep up your good work and the customer will be satisfied.

Review.Titre: The agent was extremely helpful and I…
Review.Contenu: The agent was extremely helpful and I wish all customer service agents were like her.

Review.Titre: Laurellee Ashley Stuart  customer service rep (Newair)
Review.Contenu: Laurellee Ashley Stuart from Newair was one of the best customer service reps I have ever had the pleasure of dealing with.  She was professional, kind & patient.  She walked me through what I needed to do & resolved my issue with no problem.  Thank you Laurellee.

Review.Titre: The Newair team has exceptional customer…
Review.Contenu: The Newar team has exceptional customer service! I have had my 44lb Nugget Countertop Ice Maker for a little over 9 months, and it had a few problems with pumping water. The CS team made sure that my item was replaced, and they did it with sincerity and compassion!
Charles provided A1 customer service. He handled my situation in an expeditious manner. Their are still great Customer Service Reps out here and Charles is one of them.

Review.Titre: Elizabeth was a great help in providing…
Review.Contenu: Elizabeth was a great help in providing me with technical customer service and providing me with the right parts I needed.

Review.Titre: I had a warranty issue with our ice…
Review.Contenu: I had a warranty issue with our ice maker and got the issue resolved promptly and effectively. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Elizabeth Martinez was very helpful and…
Review.Contenu: Elizabeth Martinez was very helpful and was able to help me with all of my issues

Vanessa Paula Usher Edwards is awesome. I contacted customer service and spoke with her reference a missing part to my new purchased Newair Refrigerator. Without any hesitation, she gathered my personal information and generated a shipping label for the part I needed. She was very pleasant, personal and professional the entire time.

I gave 5 stars even though my 126 can beverage cooler did not work upon arrival.  The reason for this is the excellent customer service I received from Hilary W. at Newair.  She was prompt and sympathetic to my inconvenience and with just a few pictures and information from the unit, sent me a replacement immediately.  I didn't even have to return the orginal unit, (I was not looking forward to trying to repack it).  I just had to cut the cord and send in photos.  Hilary reminded me of how customer service used to be, when the company seemed to appreciate your business.
I had a warranty need and contacted the company. Charles was very professional and helpful. He took care of my warranty and I am thankful for the assistance!
Fern is awesome! I have had 2 issues now that he has taken care of for me! Super friendly and very quick in response back. Thank you Fern and Newair.
Elizabeth was very nice and helpful with getting my replacement on my ice machine.

I was very fortunate to be connected with Hilary when I called the Newair customer care line. Hilary was able to find the product I needed, price match with a vendor, and get my product shipped to my house in time to surprise my Wife! Hilary, listened, sprang into action to solve my dilemma, and made my purchase and shipping EASY! I work for a company known for Amazing Customer Service, and Hilary is the tip-top of what it means to provide truly OUTSTANDING customer service!!!

I called in for an order, because the website wasn’t giving me the discount, Lauralee, the customer service agent was very patient and helpful and kind. She handled all my concerns, answered all my questions, in a timely fashion, and pleasantly.
Charles was able to get me a replacement since my original was damaged upon delivery. Guided me through the process and was super helpful! Thanks again for the help!

My wine refridgerator experienced a sudden failure recently. I reached out directly to Newair and luckily was connected with Ionie who took time to understand the issue, research the availability of replacement parts, and provide me with the quickest solution. In this case, it was to replace the failed unit with an entirely new unit. It arrived in a few short days, and I couldn't be happier with the service. Ionie was calm throughout the process of diagnosis and assured me everything would be taken care of. And it was! Thank you Ionie, I so appreciate your help and would recommend Newair to anyone interested in a great product backed by great people.
Perfect customer service delivered by Laurellee Ashly Stuart. All issues taken care of as fast as could be.  And the nugget icemaker is absolutely fantastic.  Thank you

Review.Titre: I would like to thank Vanessa for being…
Review.Contenu: I would like to thank Vanessa for being so friendly and helpful with my problem with the ice maker. She was very courteous and precise. Thank you so much for taking care of my problem.
Customer Service - The customer service was great. Charles helped me solve my problem with my nugget ice machine. I appreciate how kind and helpful he was.

I bought a clear ice countertop ice machine which malfunctioned within the first 12-months.  I contacted Newair for technical assistance, and was put into contact with, Vanessa in customer support.  Vanessa was absolutely terrific, and she immediately troubleshot the issue and setup a replacement unit.  Additionally, she provided excellent communication throughout the entire process and promptly answered any/all questions I had, both via telephone and email.  As a result of my experience with Newair, and the top-flight service provided by Vanessa, I would have no hesitations whatsoever with recommending this company.

Review.Titre: The agent Anfernee was super helpful in…
Review.Contenu: The agent Anfernee was super helpful in getting my order replaced when my ice maker sadly broke. Even with my current product discontinued he was able to find a replacement.

Review.Titre: Charles helped me with a replacement…
Review.Contenu: Charles helped me with a replacement unit when my machine stopped working.  Great customer service.  Thank you!
Although I have had issues with the products themselves, the customer support and response is great.  Good communication and follow through.

I have had three interactions with Newark customer service and all three have been wonderful and very helpful. They took care of my icemaker issue right away and already have its replacement on the way.

newair is a great company.  I had an issue with the new unit at delivery.  I contacted support and spoke to Charles Trapp and received courteous and quick resolution.  This company is a great company and Charles is a great asset to newair.

The ice maker we bought for our daughter for Christmas last year, suddenly started leaking and not making ice. We looked through our manual and realized there was a one year manufacturer warranty. Called the number on the book and got set up with a replacement ice maker, since our style was discontinued. Only took about 15 minutes and Hilary was wonderful to work with. She was very responsive and helpful. We sent pictures and videos of the leaking, paid a shipping cost of about $20 and our new ice machine is on the way.
I worked with Laurellee from start to finish and she was awesome! Got my replacement set and was with me each step of the way! Best customer service I've had in a while.
Thank you very much for your help with my Frigidaire cooler. I really love my cooler, it makes the summers here in Los Angeles easier.

Review.Titre: Who you buy from is as important as what you buy.
Review.Contenu: I have learned to factor in product support as well as price in large purchases. I have purchased an outdoor fridge, humidor, and countertop ice maker from Newair. For the first time, I have needed product support. My call was answered within in 1 minute. The support person was easy to understand and empathetic to my situation. I was prepared for a fight to get my situation resolved, but she just asked for my receipt and the item was instantly scheduled to be replaced. For once, I was right in selecting a company who stands by their product and hires competent people focused on customer satisfaction!
Hilary provided great customer service and arranged a replacement unit for me after my second unit stopped working.  Great communication.

Review.Titre: Charles was very helpful in getting me…
Review.Contenu: Charles was very helpful in getting me a replacement counter top ice maker and he was very friendly and helped me in a timely manner. 😊

Review.Titre: Had an issue with a missing feet on a…
Review.Contenu: Had an issue with a missing feet on a heater and the agent Laurellee promptly resolved it.
It was very professional and straight to the point.

Review.Titre: I found that my customer experience…excellent!
Review.Contenu: I found that my customer experience expert, Fern was knowledgeable, organized and very professional in his approach to resolving my issue.  The employees are what make a company great, so keep up the good work!We have other New Air products in our home and are extremely happy with the quality and service from New Air.

Review.Titre: LaurelLee was very helpful in getting a…
Review.Contenu: LaurelLee was very helpful in getting a replacement unit for me!!

My recent customer support representative (Anfernee) on my ice maker issues was top notch.  We bought the ice maker last November and became inoperable due to problems with the ice maker shovel and hinges. He was responsive to all of my emails, provided troubleshooting techniques and ultimately helped me get a new one since mine was still under warranty.  As a family of 5, with the parents working from home and 3 kids with multiple sporting events, we are constantly in need of ice.  We cant wait to get the new one!  Hopefully this one will last!  Thanks Anfernee!

Review.Titre: Best customer service I had in a long…
Review.Contenu: Best customer service I had in a long time. Felt like my issue was important to them as well as myself. Tried to come up with a solution and when that didn't work, a replacement was offered without hesitation. Most companies give pushback on honoring their warranties. Newair (Hillary Waight) was exceptional.
Charles was very helpful with helping me today with my machine issues. He was very courteous and got to the issue quickly. Thanks Charles!

Review.Titre: FERN is the face of NewAir
Review.Contenu: I was having some challenges placing my order on the internet and ended up having to phone in and Fern was very helpful in getting my part ordered.  When I realized there was another part that I was missing and did not order I contacted Fern for assistance in getting my order complete and correct, and he responded ASAP. He was friendly professional and helpful the whole time I contacted him on the occasions for help
The customer service is great. They are friendly and helpful and very responsive. We had a warranty issue and they were great at handling it.

Review.Titre: What a great experience on customer…
Review.Contenu: What a great experience on customer service,  no issues very understanding and polite  she handled it like a professional.  Thank you, other companies could take notes.

Hilary was an exceptional customer service specialist. We had an icemaker break and when I called at first the initial agent said all they could do was refund the purchase price, but I didnt want a refund, I wanted a replacement ice maker especially since they cost more now. So then I called back and spoke to Hilary and Hilary looked into the matter and got a replacement ice maker authorized within minutes. Hilary was also so pleasant to speak with and communicate with. I highly recommend her for a promotion at Newair. Thank you Hilary!
Anfernee provided good online support and explanations of everything.

Review.Titre: I did not think the fix would work but…
Review.Contenu: I did not think the fix would work but was pleasently  surprised.  Camilla knew exactly what to do and it worked!! Thank you so much, I love this ice maker and hope it ends up being reliable and long lasting. Cleaning is important and I do find that cleaner water is much better for this device. I would recommend these units to anyone and lobe the quality of the ice. Thank Camilla for the great support and staying in communication to make sure things worked out ok. It makes recommending the brand much more with support like Camilla!!

Vanessa from customer experience at NewAir has helped me three times now, and each time I’ve had to reach out she’s been so amazing. She sorted out a warranty claim and has been so kind, attentive, and professional in every communication. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Vanessa Paula Usher Edwards was very…
Review.Contenu: Vanessa Paula Usher Edwards was very kind in every interaction that I had with her.  She told me what the company could provide and made helpful suggestions. She followed through quickly. Great customer service representative.
Anfernee Lisbey made my warranty issue easy. Great customer support. Thank you very much.

Review.Titre: I had a problem with my recent purchase…
Review.Contenu: I had a problem with my recent purchase of the 6" 7 bottle wine NewAir Fridge - Ms. Hilary Waight (Customer Service Rep) was very professional and definitely resolved my issue immediately - This is the 2nd Item I have purchased from NewAir and will be purchasing additional items in the future
Great experience with customer support. They made filing a claim on Manufactured warranty as quick and painless as possible.

Review.Titre: New air dual wine fridge issue
Review.Contenu: Have been in contact with customer service for several days on a defective unit.  Just received a call back from Kevin.  He took charge and did not make excuses.  At this time he is having the parts sent out as a courtesy to resolve the problem.  His effort and engagement are most appreciated.  Looking forward to seeing the results and will update once problems resolved.  Thanks Kevin

I cannot say enough great things about NewAir. I had an older product that stopped working and Anfernee in customer support addressed the issue with me immediately and helped me replace it.I cannot wait to get my new nugget ice maker.

Review.Titre: In My Prepping Toolbox _ Newair 5 Cu.Ft Freezer in Military Green
Review.Contenu: My Newair 5 Cu.Ft. chest freezer in military green is perfect for my family. It's compact enough to fit in small spaces but large enough to handle what I need to put in it. It's easy to set up and attractive to look at. The lcd panel on the top lets me know the constant temperature of my unit. I check it with a glance every day I walk past it. More importantly, it plays an important role in the food security for my family. I'm loving this space saving Newair freezer in such a delicious color.
Amazing customer service, worked quickly to help support my issue!!!

Hillary did an excellent job assisting me with the replacement of our beverage cooler. The replacement was out of stock until December so she proactively found a similar unit that was readily available. Thank you Hillary for your great customer service!
It's support representative, Ms. Ionie. She was excellent and very knowledgeable. She answered all of my questions and the ones she couldn't, she researched and got the answers I needed.

Fantastic customer service online and on the phone. I needed a spare pet for my air conditioner and they sorted me out straight away. I haven’t had this level of customer service for years. Well done.

Review.Titre: I experienced a problem with my Newair…
Review.Contenu: I experienced a problem with my Newair Beverage Cooler and first attempted to reach customer service by phone.  That method wasn't satisfactory so I sent them a message via email.  I received a prompt reply from Charles and within a short period of time the issue was resolved.  Two thumbs up to Charles for his handling of this matter.

Review.Titre: Vanessa was wonderful to work with
Review.Contenu: Vanessa was wonderful to work with! She was professional and she was very knowledgeable and I thank you all so much! Was a very pleasant experience!
Great communication and solved my issues fast
Perfect customer service. Issue resolved with no hassle at all.   Thanks Newair

There was an issue with the delivery of my Newair fridge and Hilary Waight from customer service was great at chatting with me over the phone and helping resolve the issue. I appreciate the great customer support and look forward to getting the replacement Newair fridge soon.

Excellent customer service. My calls and e-mails were answered promptly. The agent walked me thru every step with perfectly written instructions with each step. She was polite, knowledgeable and made the process with my broken appliance run smoothly. Thank you, the great service is truly appreciated.

Ionie Castro (Newair)Oct 17, 2023, 3:37 PM PDTI received great customer service from Ionie. Unfortunately this is my second encounter with Newair. I purchased a Newair 42-44lb per day Nugget Ice Maker with Drawer Bin Black SS back in December 2022. The first one I received was damaged so I contacted Newair and was sent a replacement. The replacement worked fine until now, October 2023. My machine no longer makes ice. Thankfully I was able to call and be assisted with no problem. Ionie was very friendly and assisted with ordering my replacement. Hopefully I don’t have to call again because my 1 year warranty will be up soon.

I can not say enough about the professional manner in which Camilla Mendez, Customer Support and Newair handled my service issue.She was calm, patient and extremely helpful.  This is particularly impressive given that by the time I spoke to her I had spent several frustrating hours on the phone with the third-party warranty company and I was not in the best mood.Camilla filed my complaint and within 10 days I had a new unit at my doorstep.  THANK YOU NEWAIR AND CAMILLA
Elizabeth Martinez did a wonderful job and helping me Rectify my ice machine issue thank you so much Elizabeth for all your help.

Review.Titre: A part broke on my heater but Hilary in…
Review.Contenu: A part broke on my heater but Hilary in customer service made it easy to get a replacement.  She listened, was helpful, and placed my order for a replacement in a very short time.

Review.Titre: My ice nugget maker stopped working
Review.Contenu: My ice nugget maker stopped working. I emailed their customer service. I provided them with all the documents they needed and they shipped me a new ice nugget maker. I am very impressed with their customer service department.
Product, delivery and customer service were all first rate. I'm very happy with this company.

Review.Titre: Customer service is very helpful they…
Review.Contenu: Customer service is very helpful they always help me with my questions or concerns. Charles Trapp is super professional and very friendly.

Review.Titre: Wow. Great product and Customer Service to match!
Review.Contenu: My Humidor door arrived with a defective door.  I called customer service with my fingers crossed.  Camilla was incredibly helpful and attentive.  When I called I was preparing myself for a run around and having to go back through Amazon to get things resolved.  I was very pleasantly surprised as Camilla made my door replacement a seamless process.  She also followed up with a tracking number a couple of days later.  I am very happy with my purchase (as soon as it's all squared away).  And I would recommend Newair to anyone because of the customer service.

Review.Titre: so far unit operating as expected
Review.Contenu: so far unit operating as expected. Excellent shipping and service.

Hilary W was a great customer service representative. Always quick to return emails, Hilary was extremely pleasant, efficient and competent in handling my inquiries. Hilary quickly diagnosed the problem and quoted the required part promptly.

Review.Titre: Hilary is an awesome customer service…
Review.Contenu: Hilary is an awesome customer service tech. She quickly answered my emails and is very friendly.

Review.Titre: Had a simple component that was missing…
Review.Contenu: Had a simple component that was missing from a refurbished model. No biggie. Melissa W. from NewAir was great and had the component sent out without me having to go 12 rounds with her and turn into a little Karen. I really appreciated that.
Customer service rep was very courteous, professional and helpful.

Review.Titre: My portable air conditioner wasn't working
Review.Contenu: I purchased a portable air conditioner a year ago.  It worked beautifully the first year, but when I was ready to use it this year, the water pump was not pumping the water onto the pad.  I contacted support and spoke to Charles Trapp. He told me I was in the gray zone where the manufacturer's warranty had only a few days remaining and the additional warranty I purchased had not quite kicked in yet. After we exchanged a few emails, which I was rather late in doing as my husband was in the hospital with a broken hip, he went ahead and shipped me a new water pump along with the instructions for replacing it.I feel like he went above normal support in sending it to me even though I wasn't real fast in responding back to him.  The instructions were easy to follow and I was so happy to have the air conditioner working again.  Thank you Charlie!
Charles quickly helped me to figure out the issue and to order the needed part.competent, polite and efficient.thanks!
Newair customer service is second to none!  I was having issues with my ice maker and the representative Anfernee was able to assist me quickly in having my issue resolved!

Great price and site very intuitive even registration was easy. Only been using for 2 weeks but works great. The controls on cooler are not intuitive but if you read the manual or watch utube videos it is easy to figure out.
I would like to give thumbs up for excellent customer service provided by phone with Charles.  He stepped me through everything and assisted in several issues to resolve all problems.

Fern was gentleman that assisted me with problems with ice maker. It was not working properly and he helped me with tips and suggestions but it ended up not working in the end. He help me get a new one steps on what to do the broken one. He was very helpful, thank you fern.

Charles (in Customer Service) at Newair was super helpful with a technical issue I had. He was responsive and communicative, and good at describing what the issue needed. I appreciated that, although I purchased the item through Amazon, Newair was easy to reach.
Hilary Waight was wonderful! She called me back after I’d left a voicemail. She has answered all of my emails in a timely manner & answered all questions & took care of my issue in a timely manner.
Customer support was great to work with and company will stand behind their products.

Review.Titre: Clean, simple to navigate, and got what I needed
Review.Contenu: The site was well layer out and easy to navigate to the page I was interested in. I did find that products which are available for purchase aren’t available on the site, which is of some inconvenience, but it gave me time to rethink whether the item was suited to my intended use, which was an additional drawer for the 250 size cigar humidor. The chat was also fast and easy to use! All in all a great experience. Makes me think I’ll order directly from them in the future.

Review.Titre: Laurallie was very please and helped me…
Review.Contenu: Laurallie was very please and helped me get a replacement  for my ice machine that had stopped working. She was so professional  and I am so happy with the outcome. I love my Newair 45 pd. Nugget Ice Maker! And Newair's customer service is amazing!
Our Newair customer service agent was excellent in helping us get a replacement for our nugget ice maker. I appreciate their willingness to resolve the issue!

The process so far has been easy and responses are quick. This by far has been my very best experience with any customer service issue. My customer support rep, Laurellee, has been so nice and helpful! She's great!!

Review.Titre: I got my new ice maker yesterday I…
Review.Contenu: I got my new ice maker yesterday I waited for a hour plugged it in  everything went well but two hours no ice  4 hours no ice the coprocessor not working  I call customer service she took the information and Charles Trapp contact me more emails and pictures I have a replacement on the way thank you again Charles for taking care of your Customer

Review.Titre: There are still people who care about their customers!
Review.Contenu: Need more people like Vanessa in customer service!She resolved my internet order in no time! She is polite, knowledgeable, easy to understand, and had my order complete in minutes! Thanks again for a pleasant transaction!

Review.Titre: Newair has Products that are unmatched…
Review.Contenu: Newair has Products that are unmatched in there quality and usefulness always one of my go too providers whether for cigars or for refrigeration.
Charles helped me with my broken ice machine and he made it so easy! I wont hesitate buying a newair appliance knowing someone like Charles is working there and provides exceptional service!

Review.Titre: Customer Service does pick up the phone…
Review.Contenu: Customer Service does pick up the phone and offers solutions to problems. I have ordered fridges from them in the past. Shipping companies tend to damage items. But I would not hold that against Newair or the staff.
